title: Can't Login Into League
body:
Hey Riot,
I can't login into league for some reason. I tried restarting my computer, uninstalling and reinstalling league, using the repair button and using the hextech repair tool. Nothing is working. The error message that I get is Connection Error. This has happened to me twice now. Please reply as soon as you can. Thanks

replies.body:
Login issues can be caused by a variety of different factors. Check out our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) for a list of common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if you have any other issues with this after taking those steps.

In that case, there may be certain local network configurations that are blocking the client from reaching the login servers. There are some steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) that should help resolve this.

Let me know if those worked any better.
